about.title: About me
about.text1: Hi, I'm Denis - Fullstack developer from Ukraine. I focus on HTML5, JS, React, Node.js, PHP...
about.text2: Development, practice and work for the result are important for me. I intend to develop innovative technologies and deliver value to people. I have experience with implementation of both individual and team projects.
about.text3: Ready to implement excellent projects with wonderful people.

skills.title: Skills
skills.text1: Technologies in programming that I have studied and in the process of studying
